basic_information.scholarship_name: Debra Papajohn Reed Memorial Endowed Scholarship

description: This scholarship was established in 2013 to honor the memory of the late Debra Papajohn Reed. Debra earned a Bachelor of Arts degree at the University of Central Oklahoma in 2008 and subsequently taught courses in the UCO Theatre Arts Department. Debra was a well-known master cosmetologist and makeup artist in both the Lyric Theatre and Civic Theatre communities over the span of a successful, 40-year career. Eligibility Theatre or musical theatre major Cumulative GPA 2.5+ Sophomore, junior or senior Requirements One-page essay about how the role of make-up, hairstyling, costuming, scene design and other technical aspects of theatre impact the quality of a production. Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
